title: SPIRITUAL MEGA DOSE
author: Akeeb Kareem Akeeb Kareem The Overseer
description: AKEEB KAREEM MEDIA MINISTRIES DAILY DEVOTIONAL 18th November 2014 The Message For Today Is: SPIRITUAL MEGA DOSE Bible Meditation: Psalm 107:1-2:30; (Amplified Bible). 1 O give thanks to the Lord, for He is good; for His mercy and loving-kindness endure forever! 2 Let the redeemed of the Lord say so,
cleaned_text: SPIRITUAL MEGA DOSE AKEEB KAREEM MEDIA MINISTRIES DAILY DEVOTIONAL 18th November 2014 The Message For Today Is: SPIRITUAL MEGA DOSE Bible Meditation: Psalm 107:1-2:30; (Amplified Bible). 1 O give thanks to the Lord, for He is good; for His mercy and loving-kindness endure forever! 2 Let the redeemed of the Lord say so, whom He has delivered from the hand of the adversary, ALMIGHTY JEHOVAH GOD, IF NOT FOR THE DAILY SPIRITUAL MEGA DOSE OF YOUR LOVE, PEACE, MERCY, FAITHFULNESS AND UNCHANGING PROMISES, I WOULD HAVE LOST IT COMPLETELY IN THIS WORLD OF TEARS, PAIN AND LUST. PRAYER: Almighty Jehovah God. Where do I want to start to thank you for all you have done for me? Do I want to start from before you placed me in my Mother's Womb? Or for protecting me, for the nine months that I was a passenger in her womb? Then, what about the save delivery of me coming into the world that you created beautifully? And not to talk of your Spiritual Mega Dose that no human Doctor can rightly prescribe for guiding, protecting, loving, forgiving, and watching over me in all my sinful Journey of life till now. Please Heavenly Father, accept my thanks in Jesus Holy name. Brethren, may you be blessed today and every day. I am your brother in His Army of Salvation,
